about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of beauty and style - Part two. In this DLC three exclusive and unique skins for three cars are waiting for you.
The DLC - Power Drift includes:
  • Dtm 46 - Beast
  • Loki M4 - Drift Bomb
  • Voodo - Fighter

Note:
After purchase purchased skins will be available from the customization menu.
